§ Harus

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Harus** is a character from **18**.

§§ World 18

[[world-18]], usually just shorterned to **18**, is an animation influenced by //another animation// that was based on a hundreds-of-years-old story called [[journey-to-the-west]] (西遊記) that featured the character [[son-wu-kong]] (孫悟空), as well as influenced by ancient Egyptian mythology, and Persian mythology.

§§ About

**Harus** is the 1st son of [[usirus]].

**Harus** is [[konshoo]]'s older brother.

§§ Inspiration

The inspiration for the **Harus** character from **18** is the **ancient Egytpian god**: **Horus**.
Whose name is also sometimes spelled as: **Heru**, **Har**, **Her**, or **Hor**.

In //ancient Egytpian mythology// **Horus** is usually depicted with a falcon head.

**18** focuses on **Khonsu**:

• as a son of Osiris,
• as [[Khonshu]]'s elder brother, and
• as the power behind the ruler..
